name: ovh
description: Official Node.js wrapper for the OVH APIs
author: Vincent Giersch <vincent.giersch@ovh.net>

scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/jshint lib tests && npm run-script test-cov && npm run-script test-without-proxies
scripts.test-watch: node_modules/.bin/jshint lib tests && npm run-script test-cov-watch && npm run-script test-without-proxies-watch
scripts.test-without-proxies: node node_modules/.bin/mocha -g Proxy -i --reporter spec --ui exports tests/*.js
scripts.test-without-proxies-watch: node node_modules/.bin/mocha -w -g Proxy -i --reporter spec --ui exports tests/*.js
scripts.test-cov: node --harmony-proxies ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter spec --ui exports --check-leaks tests/*.js
scripts.test-cov-watch: node --harmony-proxies ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -w -- --reporter spec --ui exports --check-leaks tests/*.js
scripts.test-integration: node --harmony-proxies node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/integration/*.js && node node_modules/.bin/mocha -g Proxy -i --reporter spec --ui exports tests/integration/*.js
